nature_language: [当前位置南京,目标位置苏州,旅行人数2,旅行天数1] 打算从南京去苏州一日游，当天前往当天晚上回。帮我规划一下行程。。
nature_language_en: [Current location: Nanjing, Destination: Suzhou, Number of travelers: 2, Number of travel days: 1] Planning a one-day trip from Nanjing to Suzhou, departing and returning on the same day. Please help me plan the itinerary.
